ygData.subject: Dark Elf restrictions
ygData.msgSnippet: Okay, I ve been playing EQ for about a week now and my Dark Elf Shadowknight is level 9. And so far I like the character. My question is exactly how restricted
ygData.messageBody:
Okay, I've been playing EQ for about a week now and my Dark Elf
Shadowknight is level 9. And so far I like the character.

My question is exactly how restricted is it to play a Dark Elf when I
reach upper levels. I know that they are not liked in some places in
the game and guards kill you and stuff. But is it going to be so bad
that I'm totally restricted to a small area and its not gonna be fun
eventually? I just don't want to get to level 30 or so and find out
that I can't go behind the areas I'm already exploring.
